title: The Inn
overview: The innovation of The Inn 2 is that in the choice of a hotel, from location to design and construction, all participants of the show are involved - hotel staff. After guests arrive, the boss and staff use local natural resources to entertain guests, to develop a tour route around the hotel.After the show, the hotel will be left to local residents for the development of the tourism industry and will become the driving force of the local economy.
